item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 26, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Azerbaijani airline plane shot down by Ruasia (13 points | discuss)
2. ChatGPT Saved Chats: Save and organize your important conversations in ChatGPT (30 points | 19 comments)
3. Blackcandy: Self hosted music streaming server (488 points | 197 comments)
4. Cognitive load is what matters (1313 points | 533 comments)
5. Differential Growth Addon for Blender (180 points | 16 comments)
6. Unorm and SNORM to float, hardware edition (18 points | 4 comments)
7. A Minecraft server written in COBOL (154 points | 36 comments)
8. Show HN: A singing synthesizer for the browser with automatic 3-part harmony (122 points | 17 comments)
9. Siyuan: Privacy-first, self-hosted personal knowledge management software (177 points | 82 comments)
10. Portspoof: Emulate a valid service on all 65535 TCP ports (313 points | 118 comments)
11. Seconds Since the Epoch (180 points | 128 comments)
12. Startups Begin Geoengineering the Sea (8 points | 3 comments)
13. Debian's approach to Rust – Dependency handling (2022) (8 points | 1 comment)
14. Simulating C. elegans brain, body and environment interactions (32 points | 2 comments)
15. Reads Causing Writes in Postgres (170 points | 19 comments)
16. Ugandan runner due to arrive in London after 516 days, 7,700 miles on the road (207 points | 80 comments)
17. This open problem taught me what topology is [video] (442 points | 69 comments)
18. F*: A proof oriented general purpose programming language (232 points | 59 comments)
19. A new learning experience on MDN (177 points | 46 comments)
20. VPR: Nordic's First RISC-V Processor (124 points | 27 comments)
21. I thought I found a bug (100 points | 17 comments)
22. The software you need for holiday overdecoration (191 points | 48 comments)
23. Into CPS, Never to Return (115 points | 41 comments)
24. Design Space for Code Search Query (42 points | 8 comments)
25. Show HN: I made a website to semantically search ArXiv papers (288 points | 84 comments)
26. Show HN: Map of YC Startups (75 points | 26 comments)
27. The Swedish cabin on the frontline of a possible hybrid war (173 points | 85 comments)
28. Show HN: Super Snowflake Maker (140 points | 32 comments)
29. Show HN: FixBrowser – a lightweight web browser created from scratch (289 points | 131 comments)
30. Server-Sent Events (SSE) Are Underrated (284 points | 124 comments)
